name: God's Cardgame
description:
Get a chance to play with God's Cardgame and merge cards to get new items!

If you need help press the question mark for a hint.

The target is to make gold but you can focus on other things as well as there's a lot to discover.

Share with me how well you did in the comments, I would love to hear that because there are many ways to "beat the game".

btw: sorry for the game not being in the browser i couldn't do it for the life of me
